meanings.definition: A deep, narrow valley with steep sides.
meanings.sent1: The hikers trekked through the guls, surrounded by towering cliffs.
meanings.sent2: The river flowed through the guls, carving its path over centuries.
meanings.sent3: The guls were so narrow that only a single person could pass through at a time.
meanings.sent4: The guls seemed to swallow up all sound, creating a sense of isolation.
meanings.sent5: The guls were like nature's own secret corridors, hidden from the world.

meanings.definition: A large, greedy or selfish person.
meanings.sent1: The wealthy merchant was known in town as a guls, always seeking more riches.
meanings.sent2: She behaved like a guls, never sharing her toys with others.
meanings.sent3: The guls at the buffet took more than their fair share of food, leaving little for others.
meanings.sent4: His appetite for power made him a guls among his peers.
meanings.sent5: The guls demanded attention and admiration, never satisfied with what they had.

meanings.definition: To swallow greedily or in large amounts.
meanings.sent1: The hungry child guls down the delicious soup in seconds.
meanings.sent2: She tends to guls her food when she's very hungry.
meanings.sent3: The dog guls down its food so fast, it often chokes.
meanings.sent4: He guls his coffee every morning, eager to start his day.
meanings.sent5: The river guls the rainwater, rushing downstream with force.
